title: Emerald & Diamond U-Shaped Necklace: The "Manoharam" Collection
materials: and twelve lustrous South Sea Pearls (23.15 ct). Boasts the signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance and durability.
features: This exquisite U-shaped necklace features a delicate lattice-like design meticulously crafted with diamonds, interspersed with vivid teardrop-shaped emeralds and accented with dangling South Sea pearls. The central pendant showcases a larger emerald embraced by a halo of diamonds in a floral motif, culminating in a single, prominent pearl. The intricate setting enhances the sparkle of each diamond, creating a captivating display of light.
colors: with the dazzling white of the diamonds
the rich green of the emeralds
and the soft creamy white of the pearls creating a harmonious and luxurious color palette.
occasions: including bridal wear (Muhurtham) and milestone celebrations. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for sophisticated evening events.
description: This 'Manoharam' necklace is a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls offers a unique and timeless appeal, making it a treasured heirloom. The intricate craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. The U-shape design beautifully adorns the neckline, enhancing any outfit with its regal charm.
